title: Bonnie Scotland.
author: [Lippincott, Sara Jane Clarke]
snippet: Other beautiful and interesting places in the vicinity of Edinburgh are Melville Castle, Dal- keith Palace, Newbattle Abbey, Dalhousie House, and Borthwick Castle ; a fine old fortress, famous as the place where Queen Mary and the Earl of Bothwell spent a part of their honeymoon, if so sweet a name can be given to the unhappy time they lived together. Mary escaped from this castle in the disguise of a page, and fled to Dunbar.
